articles.author: Robert Barnes
articles.title: Miguel Luna Perez can pursue ADA claim, Supreme Court rules - The Washington Post
articles.description: The ruling said a young Michigan man can pursue an Americans with Disabilities Act claim while seeking via the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act.
articles.content:
Comment on this story
The Supreme Court on Tuesday sided with a deaf student who alleges his Michigan school district failed to provide him with an adequate education and should have to pay monetary… [+2204 chars]
